Windlord/Nightlight/Trinity::

Trinity heard Aerotaur left the ship, and she followed him; When she 
heard Recon threaten  "NO ONE THREAT my UNCLE" roared with her kitty 
roar.


Nightlight::

"Burning Hammer wait!!!" shouted Nightlight, when BH left the ship 
she followed him and heard Recon's Threat and she felt fear.


Windlord::

"If you want hurt one of us" said Windlord" YOu'll face all Chivtrons"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., icedemon101@h... wrote:
> Angel Prime
> 
> 
> 
> 
> he jumped infront of Aerotaur. "back down stupid one. you must not 
be 
> that bright running into a group and trying to kill one. Get ready 
to 
> die." Angel Prime extended his blades and ran at Recon. He slashed 
> one blade at Recons chest and one at his Head.
